Sentence: He (Constantine) also cites evidence that Jesus' divinity was decided by a vote at Nicaea, and that Jesus was married to Mary Magdalene, who was of royal blood, and had children by her (Magdalene)
He (Jesus) tells them that the Holy Grail is actually Mary Magdalene's body and the documents that prove Mary's blood line is related to Jesus
During the reunion, she (Sophie) discovers that her (Sophie) family is, indeed, of the bloodline of Jesus and Mary Magdalene
